com.ami.mse.ucms.db.manager.user

Interface UserManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserManagerImpl

    public interface UserManager
    Contains methods that processing instance of User using EntityManager. There are methods for save and update new or existing instance. Also there are method for extraction existing record of user from the data base.
    Author:
    Tony

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addUserRole(User user, Role roleToAdd)
      Add Role to the given user.
      void addUserRoles(User user, List<Role> rolesToAdd)

      Find record of User by it EGN.

      Update the instance of User or saves if the record do not exist in the data base.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        void save(User user)
        Save the instance of User using EntityManager.
        Parameters:
        user - the user that will be saved

      • update

        void update(User user)
        Update the instance of User or saves if the record do not exist in the data base. Uses EntityManager for the operations.
        Parameters:
        user - the user that will be updated or saved

      • findByEGN

        User findByEGN(String egn)
        Find record of User by it EGN.
        Parameters:
        egn - the egn with which will be searched record
        Returns:
        the instance of user with the found parameter EGN or null if there is none such record in the data base

      • findAll

        List<User> findAll()
        Find all records that are in the data base for the User.
        Returns:
        the list of found users or empty list if it is none records in the data base

      • findByUsername

        User findByUsername(String username)
        Find record of User by it username.
        Parameters:
        username - the username with which will be searched
        Returns:
        the user that is found or null if it is not exist such record with property username equals to the inputed parameter

      • getUserById

        User getUserById(int id)
        Find record of User by it id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id with which will be searched
        Returns:
        the user that is found or null if it is not exist such record with property id equals to the inputed parameter

      • getUserByGroup

        List<User> getUserByGroup(Group group)
        Find all records of User that have property group equals to the inputed parameter.
        Parameters:
        group - the group with which will be searched
        Returns:
        a list of found users or empty list if there is none records in the data base with users with the same value for group

      • getUserRoles

        List<Role> getUserRoles(User User)
        Gets all Role for given the user.
        Parameters:
        User - the user for which will be searched roles
        Returns:
        list of roles for the given user or empty list if there is none role assign to the given user

      • addUserRole

        void addUserRole(User user,
               Role roleToAdd)
        Add Role to the given user.
        Parameters:
        user - the user on which will be assign role
        roleToAdd - the role that will be assigned to the given user

      • addUserRoles

        void addUserRoles(User user,
                List<Role> rolesToAdd)
        Add Roles to the given user.
        Parameters:
        user - the user on which will be assign roles
        roleToAdd - the list of roles that will be assigned to the given user

      • removeUserRoles

        void removeUserRoles(User user,
                   List<Role> rolesToDelete)
        Removes Roles for the given user.
        Parameters:
        user - the user on which will be removed roles
        rolesToDelete - the list of roles that will be removed for the given user

      • removeUserRole

        void removeUserRole(User user,
                  Role roleToDelete)
        Remove Role for the given user.
        Parameters:
        user - the user on which will be removed role
        roleToDelete - the role that will be removed for the given user
